data.text:
Instructions for Poster Presenters

Please note that unlike what is written in the instructions for poster presentations, you will not be required to stand next to your poster during coffee and lunch breaks. There will be two dedicated poster presentation sessions:

Even poster numbers (not abstract numbers!) will present on Tuesday 4 June during Poster Session II (18:30 to 19:30)

Odd poster numbers will present on Wednesday 5 June during Poster Session III (18:30 to 19:30)

Poster print service:

We offer a convenient local print service through Exposale for all your poster printing needs.

Pricing:

The cost for print and onsite delivery is €80.00 excluding VAT if ordered before the deadline of May 17th.

After May 17th please ask a confirmation that the poster can be still printed depending on date of receiving the print file. The price for late poster printing is €120.00 excluding VAT.

Payment Information:

Please note that payment must be completed before the poster is printed.

Preparing Print Files for Large Format Prints:

To ensure optimal results, please adhere to the following guidelines when preparing your print files:

All posters must be designed in portrait orientation.

Poster format should be A0 (width: 84.1cm / 33.1in; height: 118.9cm / 46.8in).

Accepted file type: standard print PDF.

Ensure all print files are ideally 1:1 scale.

Name your print files descriptively for easy identification.

Convert all fonts into curves to avoid font compatibility issues.

Ideal bitmap resolution is 100-150 DPI at final size; additionally, please keep individual file sizes under 100MB if possible.

Include bleeds and correct crop marks for optimal printing.

Use/send files in CMYK color space only.

Contact Information:

To order your printed poster or for any inquiries, please contact Josef Švec of Exposale:

Email: josef.svec@exposale.cz
